name: Photo-sketch
tagline: A Lightweight simple JavaScript library to sketch and annotate on uploaded photo
body:
### Overview
This simple JS library lets you to create a few tools to edit HTML canvas elements. The functions include:
* Draw
* Change pen size
* Change pen colour
* Discard/Clean
* Set a file input to take image files and draw image on canvas
* Rotate clockwise
* Download canvas image

### Prerequisites
This library required jQuery to function :)

### Usage Example
    <html>
    </html>

### Authors and Contributors
Cynthia Xu @xixi919
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
